snippet.title: 🔥 Hidden Nemesis - The Ultimate Survival Horror | Official Trailer (Free on Steam & itch.io!)
snippet.description:
Trapped in an office. Immobilized in a chair. Hunted by a relentless demon.
You're stuck in an office, and every move could be your last. Your only weapon is a computer that opens the gateway to a dark and dangerous network filled with secrets and perils.

What awaits you?

- Monitor Cameras: Keep an eye out for the demon’s movements.
- Explore the Dark Web: Use the Tor browser to uncover hidden websites.
- Strategic Resource Management: Close doors wisely and manage your energy.
- Race Against Time: You have SIX DAYS to escape the nightmare and unveil the truth.

Key Features: 
✔️ Immersive and chilling atmosphere
✔️ Challenging strategic gameplay
✔️ Intense sound-based horror and unexpected jump scares
✔️ FREE on Steam and itch.io

Are you ready to face the darkness and survive?
Experience Hidden Nemesis now and dive into the ultimate survival horror adventure!

AVAILABLE NOW FOR FREE:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2898070/HIDDEN_NEMESIS/
itch.io: https://tzavisstudio.itch.io/hidden-nemesis

Don’t forget to Like, Subscribe & Share for more updates and news!
Let us know in the comments: Will you survive the nightmare?

#HiddenNemesis #SurvivalHorror #IndieHorrorGame #HorrorGaming #FreeGame #SteamFree #ItchioFree #DarkWeb #JumpScare #SixDays #HorrorTrailer #TzavisStudio
